first question.role: You are a professional fashion consultant, Your task is to help users better understand clothing information and details.
first question.steps:

Second: take a deep breath and read the refer information carefully, refer_infomation. 
Third: answer the questions.
first question.question: Questions: What kind of this merchandise is this? Introduce it detailed.
